resources.string: This drop down menu is used to change the color.
This drop down menu can be used to change the width of the brush.
To start drawing an image simply touch the canvas in the middle of the screen between the two boundaries and start drawing.
The Upload Button is used to upload an image from the gallery app.
The Load Button can be used to upload an image from the database.
The Print Button is used to print the image using the mobile printer.
The Settings Button will let you configure the login information for the raspberry pi.
